title: suspended
body:
account - lastsamuria101   (Hi im here for my main account back that got suspended for a pretty long time and i already paid for the cause and still don't get my account back i haven't been on it for 3 weeks and im still waiting for it. so i paid pay pal put in $20 for you so i can get my account back and that was 1 and half weeks from now and im not really that happy about that since i have my good things i worked hard for in that account and i don't to make another account and waste my time doing the same things i did already so. can i please get a reply on email and get my account back.) 

the email was paid on - [REMOVED - DON'T POST PERSONAL INFO]

thank you

replies.body:
Greetings!

If you've already gone through the chargeback process listed on the [support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks) and you're still suspended, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot Games Player Support.

Ok so this is a bit of a mess to read and I'm not sure what the issue is, but it sounds like your account was banned for a chargeback?

Did you go through player support to resolve this?
